metadata.title: राजस्थानी बेसन के गट्टे की सब्जी Gatta Curry Recipe Authentic Rajasthani - Primitive Cooking Style
metadata.description: This video shows authentic Rajasthani Gatta Curry (Besan ke Gatte ki Sabzi) cooked by a village woman using a clay pot and traditional primitive cooking methods in Ajmer, Rajasthan.

transcription_hindi: [00:00:00.000] इस वीडियो में हम राजस्थान की प्रसिद्ध हांडी गट्टा मसाला सब्जी बनते हुए देखेंगे।
[00:00:07.000] और यह आपको गांव के माहौल में, मिट्टी की हांडी और बर्तनों में दिखाया जाएगा।
[00:00:13.000] तो चलिए देखते हैं यह मुंह में पानी ला देने वाली हांडी गट्टा मसाला सब्जी।
[00:00:40.000] अगर आप इसमें लाल मिर्च डालेंगे तो यह और स्वादिष्ट बनेगी।
[00:01:43.000] यह गेहूं का आटा है और यह गरम पानी है।
[00:14:19.000] लाइक, शेयर और सब्सक्राइब जरूर करें।
transcription_english: [00:00:00.000] In this video, we will see how to make Rajasthan’s famous Handi Gatta Masala Sabzi.
[00:00:07.000] And we will show this in a village environment using a clay pot and earthen utensils.
[00:00:13.000] So let’s see this mouth-watering Handi Gatta Masala Sabzi.
[00:00:40.000] If you add red chilli powder, it becomes tastier.
[00:01:09.000] Add coriander seeds at the end.
[00:01:31.000] Otherwise the dough will become hard.
[00:01:43.000] This is wheat flour and this is hot water.
[00:01:55.000] Now we boil it on the stove.
[00:05:11.000] Where did you get the seeds from?
[00:09:35.000] Have you heard about the Khejri tree?
[00:09:52.000] It grows in the Sangri valley.
[00:14:16.000] How did you like this video?
[00:14:19.000] Please comment, like, share, and subscribe to our channel.
